channel.title: WoW and a question
channel.description:
I just want something to ask.
I got a battlechest as a gift, but I don't want to start from scratch (because of time :P). Are there people here who want to share their account with me? I just want to see if the magic from WoW is realy that magic.
Possible a high level so I can explorer everything, if you don't want too it's fine. I'm just curious. If you want, pm me the details.
Thanks ;D

item.title: WoW and a question
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

Private Message. Check it.

Read full topic

item.title: WoW and a question
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

Tbh the game isnt really that magic, but a private server is probably your best bet for exploring and getting to know the game, you can go anywhere and do anything, just dont go to dungeons and ruin them for the actual game, or you could pay a korean to power level your account

Read full topic

item.title: WoW and a question
item.dc:creator: @MybJames MybJames
item.description:
@MybJames wrote:

You can buy my account

350 USD

Read full topic

item.title: WoW and a question
item.dc:creator: @Frostie21 Frostie21
item.description:
@Frostie21 wrote:

[quote=“Waffendennis, post:1, topic:231957”]I just want something to ask.

I got a battlechest as a gift, but I don’t want to start from scratch (because of time :P).
Are there people here who want to share their account with me? I just want to see if the magic from WoW is realy that magic.

Possible a high level so I can explorer everything, if you don’t want too it’s fine. I’m just curious.
If you want, pm me the details.

Thanks ;D[/quote]

It’s not that fun starting from a high level I’d say since you don’t know much about the game.You should take Kaza’s suggestion and just try a private server and if you decide to actually start lemme know I can Recruit you and it’d help both of us,mainly you.

Read full topic

item.title: WoW and a question
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

Couldn’t you try it out on a private server ?

Never personally played WoW, never had the urge to play.

Read full topic
